医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
比较围手术期差异：袖状胃切除术与 Roux-en-Y 胃绕道术研究比较了肥胖患者的腹腔镜袖状胃切除术 (SG) 和 Roux-en-Y 胃绕道术 (RYGB)，发现这两种手术的围手术期风险和并发症均较低且相当，这对两种手术的选择标准提出了挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Comparing-perioperative-differences-Sleeve-gastrection-vs-Roux-en-Y-gastric-bypass.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Comparing-perioperative-differences-Sleeve-gastrection-vs-Roux-en-Y-gastric-bypass.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5974fb20-bc3d-47c7-a00c-68814a5b69ef Thu, 01 Feb 2024 21:12:00 -0500 Comparing perioperative differences: Sleeve gastrectomy vs. Roux-en-Y gastric bypass
母亲皮质醇水平高与意外出生问题有关一项研究表明，一小段头发可以揭示孕妇的压力水平，并且有一天可能有助于警告意外的出生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/High-maternal-cortisol-levels-linked-to-unexpected-birth-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/High-maternal-cortisol-levels-linked-to-unexpected-birth-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=669ee881-354b-4b08-b81b-94260472cb9d Thu, 01 Feb 2024 20:13:32 -0500 High maternal cortisol levels linked to unexpected birth problems
研究人员评估接触者追踪在控制 COVID-19 大流行方面的有效性在 COVID-19 大流行期间，瑞士与许多其他国家一样，依靠接触者追踪来识别可能被受感染的熟人污染的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Researchers-assess-effectness-of-contact-tracing-in-controlling-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Researchers-assess-effectness-of-contact-tracing-in-controlling-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=024a6b19-938e-4dae-89ef-5b33a402f4aa Thu, 01 Feb 2024 20:08:00 -0500 Researchers assess effectiveness of contact tracing in controlling COVID-19 pandemic
衰老研究的一种有前途的方法2024 年 1 月中旬，弗里德里希·席勒耶拿大学公开了一项重要发现：来自耶拿大学和深圳大学（中国）以及耶拿大学医院的研究团队破译了一个分子机制，该机制在乳腺癌的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/A-promising-approach-for-aging-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/A-promising-approach-for-aging-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87f76d7b-2936-4a2b-b9e4-077593141b35 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 20:02:00 -0500 A promising approach for aging research
城市绿地对空气质量有益吗？研究表明，城市绿地对空气污染控制的影响有限，街道植被可能会阻碍通风而增加污染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Are-urban-green-spaces-beneficial-to-air-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Are-urban-green-spaces-beneficial-to-air-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae42352c-f51a-49fb-af64-177fbe13fbc2 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 19:53:00 -0500 Are urban green spaces beneficial to air quality?
双重打击：中风和颈动脉撕裂会增加第一年心脏病发作的风险在中风后的第一年，或者当颈部动脉壁撕裂时，心脏病发作的风险几乎增加一倍，然而，根据在美国心脏病学会上发表的初步研究，没有中风的撕裂似乎不会增加心脏病发作的风险。中风协会 2024 年国际中风会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Double-whammy-Stroke-and-neck-artery-tear-increase-heart-attack-risk-in-the-first-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Double-whammy-Stroke-and-neck-artery-tear-increase-heart-attack-risk-in-the-first-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=497ce0f7-3d36-43a8-bfb1-7f7bd3b57c95 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:35:00 -0500 Double whammy: Stroke and neck artery tear increase heart attack risk in the first year
研究：大多数中风幸存者可以安全地服用两种常见的抗抑郁药根据将于 2024 年美国中风协会国际中风会议上发表的一项初步研究，大多数中风幸存者能够安全地服用两种常见的抗抑郁药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-Most-中风-幸存者-can-safely-take-two-types-of-common-antidepressants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-Most-中风-幸存者-can-safely-take-two-types-of-common-antidepressants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9aa583c-ea64-4cc2-9279-e1c58dd2474a Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:30:17 -0500 Study: Most stroke survivors can safely take two types of common antidepressants
遭受性侵犯的中风幸存者面临更大的康复挑战一生中经历的压力源和创伤事件可能会对随后的中风康复产生负面影响；具体来说，根据即将在美国中风协会 2024 年国际中风会议上发表的一项初步研究，中风幸存者在一生中任何时候遭受性侵犯的人在中风一年后身体机能和认知结果都会较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Stroke-survivors-expose-to- Sex-assault-face-greater-recovery-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Stroke-survivors-expose-to- Sex-assault-face-greater-recovery-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=311f10a9-e383-43b2-87d8-9af7d6ddebf3 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:26:42 -0500 Stroke survivors exposed to sexual assault face greater recovery challenges
银杏叶复方注射液可改善中风结局根据即将在国际会议上发表的一项初步研究，如果在中风后的前两周内静脉注射银杏叶生物活性成分的组合进行治疗，缺血性（血栓引起的）中风患者的认知功能可以得到更好的早期恢复。美国中风协会 2024 年国际中风会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Gingko-biloba-compound-injections-linked-to-better-中风-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Gingko-biloba-compound-injections-linked-to-better-中风-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b11c6a6-b3f7-4d29-8860-c2301ff27b47 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:22:48 -0500 Gingko biloba compound injections linked to better stroke outcomes
神经刺激加上身体康复可以促进手臂和手部功能的恢复根据美国中风协会 2024 年国际中风会议上公布的一项研究，将大脑刺激与强烈的身体康复相结合，可以帮助中风幸存者恢复手臂和手的运动，并将这些改善保持一年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Nerve-stimulation-plus-physical-rehabilitation-may-boost-recovery-of-arm-and-hand-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Nerve-stimulation-plus-physical-rehabilitation-may-boost-recovery-of-arm-and-hand-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90161fff-c687-4f7b-89f0-091f94fbf585 Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:18:34 -0500 Nerve stimulation plus physical rehabilitation may boost recovery of arm and hand function
